As a result, these questions will not appear in the review screen.A company uses Azure Data Lake Gen 1 Storage to store big data related to consumer behavior.You need to implement logging.Solution: Configure an Azure Automation runbook to copy events.Does the solution meet the goal?
A.Yes
B.No
description: Instead configure Azure Data Lake Storage diagnostics to store logs and metrics in a storage account.References:https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/azure/data-lake-store/data-lake-store-diagnostic-logs
